application

Class GameBoard

  • java.lang.Object
    • application.GameBoard

  • public class GameBoard
extends Object
    The GameBoard class contains three arrays, one for the sudoku solution, one for the initial numbers displayed from it, and one that stores player's solution
    Version:
    1
    Author:
    Captain Coder
